scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn copyAuth0 && stencil build && yarn partials
scripts.build.ci: yarn copyAuth0 && stencil build --ci && yarn partials
scripts.prestart: echo copying content asssets && cp -R ./../content-generator/series-assets ./src/components/models/ && cp -R ./../content-generator/icon-assets ./src/components/myporsche-button-content/ && cp -R ./../content-generator/icon-assets ./src/components/dealer-search-form/ && cp -R ./../content-generator/model-assets ./src/components/car-body-types-drawer/ && yarn replace
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./.stencil & rm -rf ./dist & rm -rf ./www && rm -rf ./loader && rm -rf ./src/components/models/series-assets && rm -rf ./src/components/myporsche-button-content/icon-assets && rm -rf dependency-graph && rm -rf ./src/components/models/series-assets && rm -rf ./src/components/car-body-types-drawer/model-assets
scripts.precommit.routine: yarn lint && npm test && npm run test.e2e
scripts.license.explain: echo 'This command fails on blacklisted licenses. It outputs undhandled licenses and ommits reviewed and whitelisted licenses'
scripts.license.check: yarn license.explain && license-checker --unknown --excludePrivatePackages --failOn 'AGPL; GPL-2.0; LGPL-2.1; EPL-1.0; GPL-1.0-or-later; GPL-2.0 - CE/ CDDL; CDDL-1.0; CPL-1.0; MPL-1.1; LGPL-3.0-or-later; CDDL-1.1; LGPL-3.0; MPL-2.0; AGPL-3.0; GPL-3.0; CC-BY-2.0; CC-BY-2.5; CC-BY-3.0; CC-BY-4.0; CC-BY-SA-2.0; CC-BY-SA-2.5; CC-BY-SA-3.0; CC-BY-SA-4.0; CC-BY-NC-2.0; CC-BY-NC-2.5; CC-BY-NC-3.0; CC-BY-NC-4.0; CC-BY-NC-SA-2.0; CC-BY-NC-SA-2.5; CC-BY-NC-SA-2.0; CC-BY-NC-SA-2.0' --exclude 'MIT, ISC, Apache-2.0, 0BSD, BSD-2-Clause, BSD-3-Clause, CC0-1.0' --excludePackages 'axe-core@4.8.2;spdx-ranges@2.1.1;spdx-exceptions@2.3.0;spdx-license-ids@3.0.12;caniuse-lite@1.0.30001543'
scripts.replace: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_INITIAL_STYLES-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("./public/partials").partials())') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -i -E -e "s^$regex^$partial^" index.html && placeholder1='<!--PLACEHOLDER_FONT_LINKS-->' && partial=$placeholder1$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-js/partials").getFontLinks())') && regex=$placeholder1'.*' && sed -i -E -e "s^$regex^$partial^" index.html
